content: AMA The Fifth Person Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 18 Feb 2019Please advise what should I do to my this 2 stocks?I am currently holding 2 stocks, one is Alliance Mineral drop approximately 48% another is Cosco drop approximately 30%. Both holds more than 1 year. Should I just close both eye and cut lose or continue hold it?2 answersAnswerBump0

Victor Chng, Co-Founder at Fifth Person Pte LtdLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 21 Feb 2019Hi,Firstly, you need to know what is the inital reason for your purchase. If the reason is no longer valid, cutting loss is the better option. Second, It seem like these two companies are cyclical in nature hence timing the cycle is an important factor here. If you expect the cycle to turn soon then sticking with it may be a better choice, if not you are better off cutting loss and investing in better companies that are predictable in nature to make back your losses. You don't have to make back your money the way you lose it. Remember to always compound your winner not your loser.0 comments0

Did you buy them because they have strong fundamentals and look solid or do you buy them just because someone told u they are good and you buy them to follow the hype? You have to make your own decision in such situation. Do your research on them to see if they are still looking good and have plans to do better. If your research tells you, they are not looking too good then you have to make your own decision.0 comments0
